text: Oh
hi guys and Laura Vitale and on this
episode of Laura in the kitchen I'm
going to show you how to make potato
puffs they're a perfect appetizer for
any time of year but especially around
this time of year when there's a lot of
get togethers going on whether it's for
Christmas or any holiday or for me I'll
be making these for a New Year's Eve
party so I figured I'd share the recipe
with you and let me take you over the
ingredients so we can get started you'll
need some potatoes I have been cooked
until nice and soft and you want make
sure they're peeled some puff pastry
that's been thawed some garlic
granulated garlic some sour cream a
little tiny bit of cream cheese salt and
pepper and you'll need some egg wash
which is just one egg beating with a
little bit of milk and that's it or
water I'm using water but you can use
milk whatever you got this recipe is
very simple and easy to put together and
it requires the handful of ingredients
which is great the first thing you wanna
do is get your oven preheated to 425 and
the second thing we'll do is take a
baking sheet and just line it with some
parchment paper so that that's ready now
let's get going on making the potatoes
and this is a great recipe to make with
leftover mashed potatoes if I had
leftover mashed potatoes that's what I
would use so it's wonderful for you know
you put any kind of filling in it if you
wanted to you could put in some mashed
up peas in the mashed potatoes you can
put some herbs you can do whatever you
wanted but I'm going to keep this
relatively simple because I do like the

do that you want to make sure they're
nice and soft and you mash them up to
your desired texture I'm going to take
my sour cream which provides great

adding a little bit of cream cheese
because while the sour cream provides

which I love again and it's using
granulated garlic because fresh garlic
would be just way too strong and that's
I don't I don't particularly like that

and then season it really well with some

just a little bit bigger than what it
was originally because otherwise it's a
little bit too thick and too hard to

into nine squares as even as I can
manage and then just add a dollop of

of each one
now this filling makes enough for two
sheets of puff pastry I'm only going to

to happen is I've got friends coming

it acts like a glue between the Kart VM

now all I'm doing is closing these up
